name: Reaparición del tecnovirus
text: Dale esta carta al jugador que lleva a Nathan Summers. Cuando se muestre esta carta: busca Purga del Tecnovirus en tu mazo, tu pila de descartes, tu mano y la zona de victoria,y ponla en juego. (Baraja el mazo.) Vincula esta carta a Purga del Tecnovirus. Si no es posible, descarta esta carta y coge 1 carta de Encuentro boca abajo.

flavor: "¡No importa cuál de los dos sea el clon, Cable; mi poder es superior sin ninguna duda!"
name: Dyscordia
text: Infame. Interrupción obligada: Cuando un jugador juege un Evento [[PSIÓNICO]], anula los efectos de ese Evento e inflige 1 de Daño a Dyscordia.

name: Regreso al futuro
text:
El jugador que lleva a Cableno puede quitar Amenaza de Planes que no sean Regreso al futuro. Los demás jugadores no pueden quitar Amenaza de Regreso al futuro.
El jugador que lleva a Cable no puede infligir Daño a enemigos con los que no esté enfrentado. Los demás jugadores no pueden infligir Daño a los Esbirros enfrentados con el jugador que lleva a Cable.

name: Campo de fuerza telequinético
text:
Vincula esta carta a Dyscordia. De no ser así, vincula esta carta al Villano. Interrupción obligada: cuando el personaje vinculado vaya a sufrir cualquier cantidad de Daño, evita ese Daño. Si se ha evitado al menos 2 de Daño de este modo, descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Vincula esta carta al enemigo que se está activando.

name: Exploración mental
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal. Coloca 1 de Amenaza adicional sobre el Plan principal por cada Plan secundario que haya en la zona de victoria.
[star] Aumento: quedas confundido.

name: Descarga telequinética
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: sufres 2 de Daño. Sufres 1 de Daño adicional por cada Plan secundario que haya en la zona de victoria.
[star] Aumento: quedas aturdido.

flavor: De niña, Neena fue utilizada como cobaya en un programa de creación de supersoldados denominado Proyecto Armagedón.
name: Recuerdos del Armagedón
text: Dale esta carta al jugador que lleva a Neena Thurman. El texto de reglas impreso de tu Superhéroe se trata como si estuviera en blanco (a excepción de los [[RASGOS]]). Acción de Alter ego: agota tu carta de Superhéroe → descarta Recuerdos del Armagedón.

flavor: Topaz puede manipular los poderes de los mutantes ajenos, ya sea potenciándolos.
name: Topaz
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: busca 1 copia de Retroalimentación de superpoder en el mazo de Encuentros, en su pila de descartes y en la zona apartada, y vincúlala a tu carta de Superhéroe. (Baraja el mazo.) (Esbirro Archienemigo de Dominó.)

flavor: Dominó está teniendo un día terrible, horrible, espantoso, horroroso.
name: Hoy no es mi día
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: cada jugador debe elegir entre sufrir 1 de Daño o colocar 2 de Amenaza sobre esta carta.

flavor: La buena suerte de Dominó acarrea desgracias para Prototipo, mientras que su sufrimiento le fortalece.
name: Prototipo
text: [star] Prototipo recibe +1 de Vida por cada contador de Suerte que tenga encima. Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca tantos contadores de Suerte sobre Prototipo como la cantidad de Daño que tenga acumulado tu Superhéroe.

name: Retroalimentación de superpoder
text: Vincula esta carta a tu Superhéroe. Respuesta obligada: después de que resuelvas una capacidad de tu carta de Superhéroe o de alguna carta específica de tu Superhéroe, sufres 1 de Daño. Acción de Alter ego: descarta de tu mano 1 carta específica de tu Superhéroe → descarta esta carta.

name: Arclight
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Arclight attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Confuse a character you control. • Arclight gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Arclight
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Arclight attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Confuse the character you control with the highest THW. • Arclight gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Blockbuster
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Blockbuster attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Give Blockbuster a tough status card. • Blockbuster gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Blockbuster
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Blockbuster attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Give Blockbuster a tough status card. • Blockbuster gets +2 ATK for this attack and this attack gains overkill.

name: Chimera
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Chimera attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Spend a [mental] resource. • Chimera gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Chimera
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Chimera attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Spend [mental][mental] resources. • Chimera gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Greycrow
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Greycrow attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Discard the highest-cost card you control. • Greycrow gets +X ATK for this attack, where X is the printed cost of the highest-cost card you control.

name: Greycrow
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Greycrow attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Discard each card you control with the highest cost. • Greycrow gets +X ATK for this attack, where X is the printed cost of the highest-cost card you control.

name: Harpoon
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Harpoon attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Take 2 indirect damage. • Give Harpoon 1 additional facedown boost card for this attack.

name: Harpoon
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Harpoon attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Take 3 indirect damage. • Give Harpoon 1 additional facedown boost card for this attack. This attack gains overkill.

name: Riptide
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Riptide attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal and 1 threat on each side scheme. • Riptide gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Riptide
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Riptide attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Place 3 threat on the main scheme and 1 threat on each side scheme. • Riptide gets +2 ATK for this attack and this attack gains ranged and piercing.

name: Vertigo
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Vertigo attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Stun a character you control. • Vertigo gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Vertigo
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Vertigo attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Stun the character you control with the highest ATK. • Vertigo gets +2 ATK for this attack.

back_text: Contents: Marauders on side A (side B for expert mode). Morlock Siege and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Military Grade and Mutant Slayers). Setup: Put the Routed environment into play. Set the Hide! treachery and each Morlock ally aside. Baraja el mazo the villains together (without looking) to create the villain deck. The top card of this deck is in play.
name: Knock, Knock
text: [star] Respuesta obligada: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 knock counter here. If there are at least 3 knock counters here, advance to stage 2A. If there are 3 villains under Routed, the players win the game.

back_text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Each player puts 1 set-aside Morlock ally into play under their control (2 set-aside Morlock allies instead if this is a single-player game). Baraja el mazo the Hide! treachery into the encounter deck. If the previous stage was advanced by knock counters, give each Morlock ally a tough status card.
name: Mutant Massacre
text: Action: Exhaust a [[MORLOCK]] ally → shuffle Hide! from the encounter pila de descartes into the encounter deck. If there are 3 villains under Routed, the players win the game. If this stage is completed or there are no Morlock allies in play, the players lose the game.

name: Morlock
text: Victory -1. Does not count against your ally limit. Card abilities cannot remove this ally from play. Interrupción obligada: When an enemy attacks you, it attacks a Morlock you control instead.

name: Hide!
text:
Surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Give 1 [[MORLOCK]] ally a tough status card.
[star] Aumento: Give 1 [[MORLOCK]] ally a tough status card. Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.

name: Routed
text: Standard Mode Only. Cards under here are not in play. Respuesta obligada: After the villain is defeated, put it under here. Discard each minion that shares a title with the top villain of the villain deck. (That villain is in play.) The villain activates against each player in player order.

name: Routed
text: Expert Mode Only. Cards under here are not in play. The villain gains retaliate 1 for each card under here. Respuesta obligada: After the villain is defeated, put it under here. Discard each minion that shares a title with the top villain of the villain deck. (That villain is in play.) The villain activates against each player in player order.

name: Bolstered by Wrath
text:
Vincula esta carta a the villain. Hero Action: Exhaust a character you control and spend X resources of any type, where X is the number of villains under Routed → descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: This card gets +X boost icons ([boost]), where X is the number of villains under Routed.

name: Pushed to the Limit
text: Vincula esta carta a the villain. While there is exactly 1 villain under Routed, attached villain gains steady. While there are exactly 2 villains under Routed, attached villain gains stalwart. Hero Action: Attached villain attacks you → descarta esta carta.

name: By Any Means
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1[per_hero] additional threat here for each villain under Routed.

name: In the Midst of Chaos
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1[per_hero] additional threat here for each villain under Routed.

name: Maraudin' Ain't Easy
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1[per_hero] additional threat here for each villain under Routed.

name: Territorial Control
text: Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1[per_hero] additional threat here for each villain under Routed.

name: Back in Action
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Give the villain a tough status card. Place threat on the main scheme equal to the number of villains under Routed.
[star] Aumento: If you control a Morlock ally, choose to either deal 1 damage to it or spend 1 resource of any type.

name: Seek the Weak
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Hero): The villain attacks you. If there is at least 1 villain under Routed, this attack gains overkill.
[star] Aumento: If this activation is an attack, it gains overkill.

name: Heavy Armament
text: Vincula esta carta a the enemy with the highest ATK. Attached enemy gains retaliate 2. Hero Response: After you attack the attached enemy, spend 2 resources of the same type → descarta esta carta.

name: Titanium Exoskeleton
text: Vincula esta carta a the enemy with the fewest remaining hit points. Attached enemy cannot take more than 2 damage from a single attack. Hero Action: Choose to either spend 3 resources of any type or remove a confused or stunned status card from attached enemy → descarta esta carta.

name: Inhibitor Collar
text: Vincula esta carta a tu Superhéroe. Treat tu Superhéroe's printed text box as if it were blank (except for traits). Action: Choose to either exhaust a character you control or take 3 damage → descarta esta carta. (Any player can do this.)

flavor: This kind of hardware isn't found on the black market. Someone high up in the U. S. government must be supplying it.
name: The Senator's Support
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The first player descarta cards from the top of the encounter deck until an attachment is discarded and reveals that card.

name: Arclight
text: Retaliate 1. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Arclight attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Confuse a character you control. • Arclight gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Blockbuster
text: Guard. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Blockbuster attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Give Blockbuster a tough status card. • Blockbuster gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Chimera
text: Patrol. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Chimera attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Spend a [mental] resource. • Chimera gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Greycrow
text: Retaliate 1. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Greycrow attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Discard the highest-cost card you control. • Greycrow gets +X ATK for this attack, where X is the printed cost of the highest-cost card you control.

name: Harpoon
text: Guard. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Harpoon attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Take 2 indirect damage. • Harpoon gets +2 ATK for this attack and this attack gains piercing.

name: Riptide
text: Patrol. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Riptide attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal and 1 threat on each side scheme. • Riptide gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Vertigo
text: Guard. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Vertigo attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Stun a character you control. • Vertigo gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Mutant Slayers
text: Each [[MARAUDER]] minion gains quickstrike. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1 additional threat here for each character in play with 1 or more of the following traits: [[MUTANT]], [[X-FACTOR]], [[X-FORCE]], or [[X-MEN]].

name: Bound by Business
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[MARAUDER]] minion that does not share a title with a card in play is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with you.

back_text: Contents: Marauders on side A (side B for expert mode). On the Run, Mutant Slayers, and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Military Grade and Nasty Boys). Setup: Put 1 random [[MARAUDER]] villain into play. Remove the minion with the same title as the villain, along with each other villain, from the game. Attach the Hope's Captor attachment to the villain, [[CONFIDENT]] side up.
name: Gotta Get Away
text: Each [[MARAUDER]] minion gains steady. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Each player searches the encounter deck for a [[MARAUDER]] minion and puts it into play engaged with them. (Baraja el mazo.) If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

back_flavor: Having taken a pounding, the Marauders redouble their efforts to escape with their captive.
back_text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Each player searches the encounter deck and pila de descartes for a [[MARAUDER]] minion and puts that minion into play engaged with them. (Baraja el mazo.) Give each [[MARAUDER]] enemy a tough status card.
name: Escaping with Hope
text: Each [[MARAUDER]] minion gains guard and steady. In expert mode, the villain gains steady. If the villain is defeated, the players win the game. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Hope's Captor
text: Permanent. [star] Interrupción obligada: When the villain would attack you, if a [[MARAUDER]] minion is engaged with you, the villain schemes instead. Interrupción obligada: When the villain would be defeated, reset attached villain's hit points to its printed hit point value instead. Flip this card and reveal it.

name: Hope's Captor
text: Permanent. The villain gets +6[per_hero] hit points. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Advance the main scheme to stage 2A. This effect cannot be canceled. [star] Interrupción obligada: When the villain would attack you, if a [[MARAUDER]] minion is engaged with you, the villain schemes instead.

name: Hidden in the Clutter
text: Vincula esta carta a the enemy with the fewest remaining hit points. Interrupción obligada: When any amount of damage would be dealt to attached enemy, place it here instead. If there is at least 3 damage here, attached enemy attacks the player who dealt the damage just placed here. Then, descarta esta carta.

name: Favored Weapon
text: Vincula esta carta a Greycrow or Harpoon. De no ser así, attach to the [[MARAUDER]] enemy with the lowest ATK. [star] Attached enemy's attacks gain overkill, piercing, and ranged. Hero Response: After your hero defends against an attack from attached enemy and takes no damage → descarta esta carta.

name: Bushwhack
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches the encounter deck and pila de descartes for a [[MARAUDER]] minion and puts that minion into play engaged with them. (Baraja el mazo.)

name: Pure Force
text:
While Blockbuster is in play, this scheme gains the crisis icon ([crisis]).
While Chimera is in play, this scheme gains the amplify icon ([amplify]).

name: Dizzying Deeds
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Exhaust a character you control. If the following enemies are in play: • Arclight — Stun a character you control. • Riptide — Take 3 indirect damage. • Vertigo — Confuse a character you control.

name: Tag Team
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose: • Each [[MARAUDER]] minion engaged with you activates against you. • Discard 7 cards from the top of the encounter deck. Put the topmost [[MARAUDER]] minion in the encounter pila de descartes into play engaged with you.

name: Gorgeous George
text:
Teamwork ([[NASTY BOY]]). [star] Interrupción obligada: When Gorgeous George attacks you, exhaust a character you control.
[star] Aumento: Exhaust a character you control.

name: Hairbag
text:
Surge. Teamwork ([[NASTY BOY]]).
[star] Aumento: After this activation, shuffle Hairbag into the encounter deck.

name: Ramrod
text:
Retaliate 1. Teamwork ([[NASTY BOY]]). [star] Ramrod's attacks gain piercing.
[star] Aumento: If the villain is attacking, this attack gains piercing.

name: Ruckus
text:
Teamwork ([[NASTY BOY]]). Cuando se muestre esta carta: Stun each character you control.
[star] Aumento: quedas aturdido.

name: Slab
text: Teamwork ([[NASTY BOY]]). Toughness. [star] Interrupción obligada: When Slab attacks, place 1 growth counter on him. Slab gets +1 ATK for each growth counter on him for this attack.

name: Get Nasty
text: Each minion gets +1 ATK. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1 threat here for each minion in play (2 threat instead for each [[NASTY BOY]]). Search the encounter deck and pila de descartes for a [[NASTY BOY]] minion and reveal it. (Baraja el mazo.)

flavor: "Ain't nothin'—ain't nobody—can beat me!"
name: Juggernaut
text: [star] Juggernaut gets +1 ATK for each momentum counter here. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1 momentum counter here. Give Juggernaut a tough status card.

name: Juggernaut
text: [star] Juggernaut gets +1 ATK for each momentum counter here. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1 momentum counter here. If Juggernaut Exposed is in play, flip it. De no ser así, give Juggernaut a tough status card.

name: Juggernaut
text: [star] Juggernaut gets +1 ATK for each momentum counter here. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Search the encounter deck and pila de descartes for Head of Steam and reveal it. (Baraja el mazo.) If Juggernaut Exposed is in play, flip it. De no ser así, give Juggernaut a tough status card.

back_text: Contents: Juggernaut (I) and Juggernaut (II) (Juggernaut (II) and Juggernaut (III) instead for expert mode). Juggernaut, Hope Summers, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Black Tom Cassidy). Setup: Attach Juggernaut's Helmet to Juggernaut. Put Home Summers into play under the first player's control.
name: The Unstoppable Juggernaut
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When this scheme would be completed, instead do each of the following: 1. Remove all threat from here. 2. If Juggernaut Exposed is in play, flip it. 3. Place 1 momentum counter on Juggernaut. 4. Juggernaut attacks each player in player order (even if they are in alter-ego form).

name: Juggernaut's Helmet
text: Permanent. Vincula esta carta a Juggernaut. Juggernaut gains stalwart and his attacks gain overkill. Hero Action: Spend 3 resources of the same type → remove each momentum counter from Juggernaut. Flip this card.

name: Juggernaut Exposed
text: Permanent. Vincula esta carta a Juggernaut. Juggernaut takes 1 additional damage from each card with a printed [mental] resource. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Juggernaut schemes, place 1 momentum counter on Juggernaut. Flip this card.

name: Head of Steam
text: Juggernaut gains retaliate X, where X is the number of momentum counters on Juggernaut. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Attach Head of Steam to Juggernaut and place 1 momentum counter on him. Hero Response: After Juggernaut attacks you, spend 1 resource for each damage dealt by that attack → descarta esta carta.

name: Building Momentum
text: Hero Response: After you defend against an attack from Juggernaut, remove 1 threat from this scheme.

flavor: "Oh, yeah!" — Juggernaut
name: Breakthrough
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose: • Take damage equal to Juggernaut's ATK. • Discard the highest-cost upgrade or support you control.

name: Flatten
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose to either take damage equal to Juggernaut's ATK or place 1 momentum counter on him.
[star] Aumento: Give Juggernaut a tough status card.

name: Ground Pound
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: The players as a group take indirect damage equal to Juggernaut's ATK.
[star] Aumento: Take 1 indirect damage.

name: Trample
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter-Ego): Take 2 indirect damage. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Hero): Juggernaut attacks the ally with the fewest remaining hit points.
[star] Aumento: Deal 1 damage to an ally you control.

name: Cyttorak's Exemplar
text: In expert mode, this card gains incite 1. Cuando se muestre esta carta: If Juggernaut Exposed is in play, flip it and place 1 momentum counter on Juggernaut. De no ser así, place threat on the main scheme equal to Juggernaut's ATK.

name: Hope Summers
text: Setup. The first player controls Hope Summers. Hope Summers does not count against your ally limit. [star] Hope Summer's base THW and base ATK are equal to the THW and ATK of your hero. If Hope Summers leaves play, the players lose the game.

flavor: "Alright, alright. I know the deal," Hope grumbles to her captor. "This isn't my first time being captured, you know."
name: Captive Hope
text: Hope Summers cannot ready. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Exhaust Hope Summers.

name: Black Tom Cassidy
text: Villainous. Black Tom Cassidy cannot take damage while Creeping Willow is in play. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Search the encounter deck and pila de descartes for 1 copy of Creeping Willow and put it into play engaged with you. (Baraja el mazo.)

name: Creeping Willow
text:
Guard. Quickstrike. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Creeping Willow attacks and damages a character, stun that character.
[star] Aumento: quedas aturdido.

name: Making Green
text:
Hinder 2[per_hero].
Each copy of Creeping Willow gains surge.

name: A Sound Thrashing
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Each copy of Creeping Willow attacks the player it is engaged with (even if that player is in alter-ego form). If you were not attacked this way, search the encounter deck and pila de descartes for a copy of Creeping Willow and reveal it. (Baraja el mazo.)

flavor: "Visionary, savior, madman. It doesn't matter. I am SINISTER."
name: Mister Sinister
text: Respuesta obligada: After a status card is placed on Mister Sinister, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Mister Sinister
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1[per_hero] threat on the main scheme (2[per_hero] threat instead if Mister Sinister has fewer than 2 [[SUPERPOWER]] attachments). Respuesta obligada: After a status card is placed on Mister Sinister, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

name: Mister Sinister
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 2[per_hero] threat on the main scheme (3[per_hero] threat instead if Mister Sinister has fewer than 2 [[SUPERPOWER]] attachments). Respuesta obligada: After a status card is placed on Mister Sinister, place 3 threat on the main scheme.

back_text: Contents: Mister Sinister (I) and Mister Sinister (II) (Mister Sinister (II) and Mister Sinister (III) instead for expert mode). Mister Sinister, Flight, Super Strength, Telepathy, Hope Summers, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Nasty Boys). Setup: Set aside the Flight, Super Strength, and Telepathy encounter sets. Put Hope Summers into play under the first player's control.
flavor: The secret laboratory hidden deep below the abandoned orphanage is filled with vats containing innocent mutants, subjects of Sinister's experiments.
name: Sinister Intent
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Remove 1 random stage 2 from the game. Then advance to a random stage 2A.

back_flavor: Mister Sinister sets about incorporating another mutant's DNA into his own genome.
name: Taking Off
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Attach the Flight attachment to Mister Sinister and shuffle the rest of the Flight encounter set into the encounter deck. When Completed: Advance to the other stage 2A. If you cannot, advance to stage 3A.

back_flavor: Mister Sinister sets about incorporating another mutant's DNA into his own genome.
name: Bulking Up
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Attach the Super Strength attachment to Mister Sinister and shuffle the rest of the Super Strength encounter set into the encounter deck. When Completed: Advance to the other stage 2A. If you cannot, advance to stage 3A.

back_flavor: Mister Sinister sets about incorporating another mutant's DNA into his own genome.
name: Focusing In
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Attach the Telepathy attachment to Mister Sinister and shuffle the rest of the Telepathy encounter set into the encounter deck. When Completed: Advance to the other stage 2A. If you cannot, advance to stage 3A.

back_flavor: "Gaze upon my power and despair!" Sinister cackles. "Once I add Hope's mutation into my genetic code, I will be capable of mimicking any mutant's powers, and thus will have attained perfection!"
back_text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Deal each player 1 facedown encounter card.
flavor: "I should thank you," Sinister sneers. "You've done what my bumbling flunkies could not: You brought me Hope."
name: Sinister Ends
text: Interrupción obligada: When Mister Sinister attacks, he attacks Hope Summers instead. (Other characters may defend the attack.) If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Sinister Disguise
text: Vincula esta carta a Minister Sinister. Interrupción obligada: When a player would deal damage to Minister Sinister, that player may spend [mental][mental] resources. If they do not, they deal that damage to the friendly character with the fewest remaining hit points instead. Discard this card (whether the resources were spent or not).

name: Sinister Soldier
text:
[star] Sinister Soldier gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each [[SUPERPOWER]] attachment on Minister Sinister.
[star] Aumento: For this activation, Mister Sinister gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each [[SUPERPOWER]] attachment on him.

name: Teleported Away
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Mister Sinister cannot take damage. Interrupción obligada: When Mister Sinister would attack, he schemes instead.

name: Genetic Mastery
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: If Mister Sinister has the following traits: • [[AERIAL]] — Take 2 indirect damage. • [[BRUTE]] — agota tu carta de Superhéroe. • [[PSIONIC]] — coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal.

name: Molecular Control
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Give Mister Sinister a tough status card. If he has the [[BRUTE]] trait, he heals 4 damage.
[star] Aumento: Give Mister Sinister a tough status card.

name: Sinister Schemes
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Mister Sinister schemes. If he has the [[PSIONIC]] trait, you are confused.
[star] Aumento: quedas confundido.

name: Sinister Strike
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Hero): Mister Sinister attacks you. If he has the [[AERIAL]] trait, you are stunned.
[star] Aumento: quedas aturdido.

name: Flight
text:
Setup. Vincula esta carta a the villain.
Permanent.
Attached villain gains the [[AERIAL]] trait.
[star] Attached villain's attacks gain overkill.

name: Aerial Bombardment
text: Vincula esta carta a the villain. [star] Attached villain gets +1 ATK and ignores the retaliate keyword while attacking a non-[[AERIAL]] character. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][mental] resources → descarta esta carta.

name: Out of Reach
text: Vincula esta carta a the villain. The villain cannot take damage unless the attacker or attack has the [[AERIAL]] trait, or the attack has ranged. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [energy][energy] resources → descarta esta carta.

name: High Ground
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Discard each tough status card from each friendly character. The players as a group take 2 indirect damage (4 indirect damage instead if the villain has the [[BRUTE]] trait).
[star] Aumento: If the villain is attacking, this attack gains piercing.

name: Super Strength
text: Setup. Vincula esta carta a the villain. Permanent. Attached villain gains the [[BRUTE]] trait and steady. (Steady characters require 2 status cards of the same type to be stunned or confused.)

name: Impervious
text: Vincula esta carta a the villain. Reduce the amount of damage attached villain takes from each attack by 1. Hero Action: Spend [physical][physical] resources → give the villain a tough status card and descarta esta carta.

name: Thrown Object
text: Vincula esta carta a the villain. [star] Attached villain's attacks gain ranged. [star] Respuesta obligada: After the villain attacks, descarta esta carta.

name: "I'll Take That"
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Discard the upgrade you control with the lowest cost (highest cost instead if the villain has the [[PSIONIC]] trait). If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge.

name: Telepathy
text: Setup. Vincula esta carta a the villain. Permanent. Attached villain gains the [[PSIONIC]] trait and retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)

name: Manufactured Drama
text: Supports you control cannot ready. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Exhaust each support you control. If no supports were exhausted this way, this card gains surge. Acción de Alter ego: agota tu carta de Superhéroe and descarta 1 card from the top of your deck for each support you control → descarta esta carta.

flavor: "I dare you to call me 'Peaches' again!" — Dominó
name: Sowing Discord
text: Allies you control cannot ready. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Exhaust each ally you control. If no allies were exhausted this way, this card gains surge. Acción de Alter ego: Spend [mental][mental] resources → descarta esta carta.

name: One Step Ahead
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Discard 1 random card from your hand (2 random cards instead if the villain has the [[AERIAL]] trait).
[star] Aumento: If the villain is attacking, this attack gains overkill.

flavor: "Kneel before your superior!"
name: Dyscordia
text: [star] While Dyscordia is attacking you, he gets +X ATK, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in your hand.

name: Dyscordia
text: [star] While Dyscordia is attacking you, he gets +X ATK, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in your hand. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[PSIONIC]] attachment is discarded and reveals that card.

name: Dyscordia
text: [star] While Dyscordia is attacking you, he gets +X ATK, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in your hand. Respuesta obligada: After you attack Dyscordia, take X damage, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in your hand.

back_text: Contents: Dyscordia (I) and Dyscordia (II) (Dyscordia (II) and Dyscordia (III) instead for expert mode). Dyscordia, Hope Summers, and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Extreme Measures and Mutant Insurrection). Setup: Put Hope Summers into play under the first player's control. Reveal Dyscordia's Grasp.
flavor: Hope tries to mimic Dyscordia's abilities, but is quickly overwhelmed by the power.
name: Uncontrollable Power
text: [star] Respuesta obligada: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player places X threat here, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in their hand. Each player may descarta 1 card from their hand before calculating the value of X. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

back_flavor:
Hope breaks free from Dyscordia's grasp, but she struggles to contain his powerful psionic energies.
"I will leave Hope to finish the job of killing you all," Dyscordia laughs. "I have work to do bringing about the Apocalypse!"
flavor: Dyscordia is attempting to escape into the past. Who knows what havoc he will wreak?
name: Left to Your Fate
text: Dyscordia gains stalwart. Each identity gets +2 hand size. Increase the resource cost to play each player card by 1. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Dyscordia's Grasp
text: Permanent. Hinder 6[per_hero]. Hope Summers can attack only Dyscordia and can thwart only this scheme. Respuesta obligada: After Dyscordia is defeated or the last threat is removed from this scheme, flip this card and reveal Living Bomb. Place any threat here on Living Bomb.

flavor: Mimicking Dyscordia's power is too much for Hope to control and threatens to overwhelm her...with explosive results!
name: Living Bomb
text: Victory 1. Stryfe cannot be defeated. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Advance the main scheme to stage 2A. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Mental Transferal
text: If Dyscordia's Grasp is in play, attach to Hope Summers. De no ser así, attach to tu Superhéroe. Respuesta obligada: After Dyscordia takes any amount of damage, attached character takes an equal amount of damage. Discard this card.

name: Mind Alteration
text: Vincula esta carta a your identify. Respuesta obligada: After you play an event or upgrade, sufres 1 de Daño. Response: After you recover, spend a [mental] resource → descarta esta carta.

name: Mind Trap
text: Vincula esta carta a your identify. Your allies, upgrades, and supports enter play exhausted. Acción de Alter ego: Exhaust 3 cards you control → descarta esta carta.

name: Psiónico Amnesia
text: Vincula esta carta a your identify. Increase the resource cost of each ally and support you play by 2. Response: After you play an ally or support, exhaust tu Superhéroe → descarta esta carta.

flavor: "It is...as if...something...is holding...Caliban back!" — Caliban
name: Psychic Inertia
text: Vincula esta carta a your identify. Hero Action: If your hero attacked and thwarted this phase → descarta esta carta.

name: Zero
text: Guard. Patrol. Toughness. When Defeated: If the player who defeated Zero does not have at least 3 cards of the same type in their hand, shuffle Zero into the encounter deck.

name: Cerebral Erasure
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Return an upgrade or support you control to its owner's hand. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme returns an upgrade or support they control to its owner's hand.

name: Telepathic Camouflage
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Each player places X threat here, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in their hand.

name: Psiónico Surge
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Discard the top X cards of the encounter deck, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in your hand. Deal each [[PSIONIC]] card discarded this way to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Psychic Override
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose a card type, then descarta each card from your hand that is not of that type. Draw up to your hand size. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each card of the chosen type in your hand.
[star] Aumento: Discard 1 card from your hand. Then, draw 1 card.

name: Telekinetic Wave
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Return an upgrade or support you control to your hand. Dyscordia activates against you.
[star] Aumento: If you have at least 3 cards in your hand that share a type, place 3 threat on the main scheme.

name: Strobe
text: Patrol. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose: • Stun each character you control. • Deal 1 damage to each character you control.

name: Tempo
text: While Tempo is engaged with you, you get +1 hand size. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Tempo activates against you, descarta cards from the top of your deck equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.

name: Thumbelina
text: Reduce the amount of damage Thumbelina takes from each attack by 1 unless the attacker has the [[TINY]] trait. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Return the highest-cost upgrade you control to its owner's hand.

name: Wildside
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose: • Wildside attacks you. • Return the highest-cost support you control to its owner's hand.

name: Extreme Measures
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Respuesta obligada: After a player card enters play, its controller takes indirect damage equal to that card's printed cost.

name: Dragoness
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Dragoness activates against you, she gets +X SCH and +X ATK for that activation, where X is the number of [energy] resources in your hand.

flavor: "They call me Forearm because I give good back rubs."
name: Forearm
text: [star] Respuesta obligada: After Forearm attacks you, descarta X cards from the top of your deck, where X is the number of [physical] resources in your hand.

name: Reaper
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: When Reaper attacks you, if you have at least: • [mental][mental] resources in your hand, stun tu Superhéroe. • [mental][mental][mental][mental] resources in your hand, exhaust tu Superhéroe.

name: Samurai
text: [star] Respuesta obligada: After Samarai attacks you, place 1 charge counter here. Choose: • Take damage equal to the number of charge counters on Samurai. • Discard 1 card you control with printed cost equal to or greater than the number of charge counters on Samurai.

name: Mutant Insurrection
text: Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) Each minion gains toughness. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 2 additional threat here for each [[MUTANT LIBERATION FRONT]] character in play. If no additional threat was placed this way, this card gains surge.

name: Lady Mastermind
text:
Surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Take X damage, where X is the printed cost of the event in your hand with the highest cost.
[star] Aumento: Discard an event from your hand.

name: Malice
text: Surge. When Defeated: Attach Malice to the non-[[PSIONIC]] ally with the highest cost. Attached ally engages its controller. Threat attached ally as a [[POSSESSED]] minion with a blank text box (except for [[TRAITS]]). Attached minion's SCH is equal to its THW and it does not take consequential damage.

flavor: "Not so tough with your powers turned off, are you?"
name: Scrambler
text: Surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Discard an upgrade you control.

name: Vanisher
text:
Surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Return the support you control with the highest cost to your hand.
[star] Aumento: Return the support you control with the highest cost to your hand.

name: Under Pressure
text:
Surge.
[star] Aumento: Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.

name: Overburdened
text:
Surge. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Choose to either descarta 1 resource card from your hand or take 2 damage.
[star] Aumento: Choose to either descarta 1 resource card from your hand or take 2 damage.
